#


CorpusLoaders.poormans_tokenize
 
 
Method
.


poormans_tokenize


Tokenizes by removing punctuation and splitting on spaces


source


#


CorpusLoaders.punctuation_space_tokenize
 
 
Method
.


Tokenizes by removing punctuation, unless it occurs inside of a word


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semcor.index_semcor
 
 
Method
.


Index a semcor stream, by word (sense-key), so that examples of sentenced where that word was used can found.


iter = lazyload_indexed_semcor(
corpora/semcor2.1/brown1/tagfiles/
)
uses = index_semcor(iter)
uses[
produce%2:39:01::
]




source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semcor.lazyload_semcor
 
 
Method
.


Load up a semcor corpus, lazily – one file at a time. Eg 
lazyload_semcor("corpora/semcor2.1/brown1/tagfiles/")


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semcor.load_semcor
 
 
Method
.


Load up a semcor corpus. Eg 
load_semcor("corpora/semcor2.1/brown1/tagfiles/")


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semcor.strip_tags
 
 
Method
.


Remove all the tagging information, returning just tokenized words


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semeval2007t7.lazyload_challenges_semeval2007t7
 
 
Method
.


Lazily load semeval 2007 Task 7 corpus of challenges Eg 
lazyload_challenges_semeval2007t7("semeval2007_t7/test/eng-coarse-all-words.xml")


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semeval2007t7.lazyload_solutions_semeval2007t7
 
 
Function
.


Lazy Load SemEval 2007 Task 7 corpus of solutions Eg 
lazyload_solutions_semeval2007t7("semeval2007_t7/key/dataset21.test.key")


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semeval2007t7.load_challenges_semeval2007t7
 
 
Method
.


Load SemEval 2007 Task 7 corpus of challenges Eg 
lazyload_challenges_semeval2007t7("semeval2007_t7/test/eng-coarse-all-words.xml")


source


#


CorpusLoaders.Semeval2007t7.load_solutions_semeval2007t7
 
 
Method
.


Load SemEval 2007 Task 7 corpus of solutions Eg 
load_solutions_semeval2007t7("semeval2007_t7/key/dataset21.test.key")
